participant_1.background:
I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students.
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.
I enjoy trying to recreate my favorite dishes from my parent's home country.
I have fibromyalgia, so I need to stay warm this winter.
My wife is a stay-at-home mom and my kids are all in school.

participant_2.background:
I am of mixed race and enjoy exploring the city with my best friend.
I'm proud of my collection of ancient weapons from different cultures.
i am well built and tall.
i would like to be a teacher in the future.
I'm not into fortune tellers, but I'm really interested in my family history.

content.text: I like to try new things, but I\'m a big fan of Indian food.
I like Indian food too! What\'s your favorite dish?
Me too! It\'s so good. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to explore the city with my best friend.
That sounds fun! What kind of things do you like to explore?
We like to go to different museums and art galleries.
That sounds really cool. I\'ve never been to an art gallery before.
You should go! It\'s really interesting to see how different cultures express themselves through art.
I will definitely check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I\'m glad I could help.
